# sourceName

**Instance Property**

Name of the layer that the constraint is calculated relative to.

## Declaration

```swift
var sourceName: String { get }
```

## Accessing Constraint Values

- **attribute**: The attribute the constraint affects.
- **offset**: Offset value of the constraint attribute.
- **scale**: Scale factor of the constraint attribute.
- **sourceAttribute**: The constraint attribute of the layer the receiver is calculated relative to

items.description: Offset value of the constraint attribute.
